mapper.select: SELECT orderId, userId, orderDate, orderTotalPrice, orderStatus FROM "order" WHERE userId = #{userId} ORDER BY orderDate DESC
SELECT o.orderId, o.goodsId, o.orderItemPrice, o.orderItemCount, g.goodsName, g.goodsTeam FROM orderItem o JOIN goods g ON o.goodsId = g.goodsId WHERE o.orderId = #{orderId}
mapper.update: UPDATE "order" SET orderStatus = CASE WHEN #{date} - 3 > orderDate THEN 2 WHEN #{date} - 1 > orderDate THEN 1 ELSE 0 END WHERE #{date} > orderDate
